Field Detail

listeners

protected List<CommandListener> listeners
A list of command listeners. A listener listens to the statements being executed and is able to intercept specific ones.

startMessage

protected String startMessage
The message that should be shown when a statement is executed.

ignoreStack

protected Stack ignoreStack
Errors that should be ignored.

ignoreSet

protected HashSet ignoreSet
Errors that should be ignored. This set is kept in sync with the ignoreStack.

dontCount

protected boolean dontCount
Indicates that the statements are transient and should not be counted.

conditionTrueCounter

protected int conditionTrueCounter
Together with conditionFalseCounter this enables nested conditions. As long as nested conditions evaluate to true the conditionTrueCounter gets incremented. After the first nested condition evaluates to false, the conditionFalseCounter get incremented.

conditionFalseCounter

protected int conditionFalseCounter
Together with conditionTrueCounter this enables nested conditions. As long as nested conditions evaluate to true the conditionTrueCounter gets incremented. After the first nested condition evaluates to false, the conditionFalseCounter get incremented.

callBack

protected ProgressListener callBack
The progress listener.

patchFile

protected PatchFile patchFile
The upgrade file being executed.

defaultDatabase

protected Database defaultDatabase
The default database. At the start of each change set, this database is put into currentDatabase to become the current database.

currentDatabase

protected Database currentDatabase
The current database. Gets reset to the default database at the start of each change set.

databases

protected Map<String,Database> databases
All configured databases. This is used when the upgrade file selects a different database by name.

dbVersion

protected DBVersion dbVersion
The class that manages the DBVERSION and DBVERSIONLOG table.

Constructor Detail

Patcher

public Patcher(ProgressListener listener,
               Database database)
Construct a new instance of the patcher.

Parameters:
listener - Listens to the progress.
database - The default database to use. This database also contains a default user. Version tables will be looked for in this database in the schema identified by the default user.
Method Detail

reset

protected void reset()
Resets the upgrade context. This is called before the execution of each changeset.

openPatchFile

public void openPatchFile(String fileName)
Open the specified upgrade file.

Parameters:
fileName - The name and path of the upgrade file.

openPatchFile

public void openPatchFile(File baseDir,
                          String fileName)
Open the specified upgrade file in the specified folder.

Parameters:
baseDir - The base folder from where to look. May be null.
fileName - The name and path of the upgrade file.

closePatchFile

public void closePatchFile()
Close the upgrade file.

getTargets

public LinkedHashSet<String> getTargets(boolean tips,
                                        String prefix,
                                        boolean downgradeable)
Returns all possible targets from the current version.

Parameters:
tips - If true only the tips of the upgrade paths are returned.
prefix - Only return targets that start with the given prefix.
downgradeable - Also consider downgrade paths.
Returns:
All possible targets from the current version.

init

public void init()
          throws SQLExecutionException
Use the 'init' change sets to upgrade the DBVERSION and DBVERSIONLOG tables to the newest specification.

Throws:
SQLExecutionException - Thrown when the execution of an SQL statement fails.

           throws SQLExecutionException

patch

public void patch(String target,
                  boolean downgradeable)
           throws SQLExecutionException
Patches to the given target version. The target version can end with an '*', indicating whatever tip version that matches the target prefix.

Parameters:
target -
Throws:
SQLException
SQLExecutionException
